head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MUSS, BADNER, RITA

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MUSS, BADNER, RITA

block.p: MUSS-BADNER-Rita. On August 30, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Louis Muss. Loving mother of Elizabeth Muss, Marion Green and Henry Muss. Cherished grandmother of Saundra Green-Rice. Services Friday 9:45AM at ''The Riverside'', 76th St. & Amsterdam Ave. Contributions in her memory may be made to the Services for the Underserved, 305 Seventh Avenue, 10th Floor, NY, NY 10001
